name: Mr. Avantha Ranmal Dias Weerasinha
titles: Founder / Head Coach Stingrays Swimming School
Bsc. Sports Coaching – UK / L2 Swimming Teacher – UK / L3 Personal Trainer – UK
description: Thank you for the work you did with the rebranding of the website stingrays.lk. We have been getting very good feedback on the new website, The web site, in particular, is proving very beneficial. Having a mobile-first site with an integrated content management system is proving to be very useful.
